title: Implement login functionality
description: As a user, I want to be able to log in to the application so that I can access my account.
acceptance_criteria: User can enter their username and password
System displays an error message if the login credentials are incorrect

title: Allow users to search for products
description: As a user, I want to be able to search for products in the application so that I can find what I am looking for.
acceptance_criteria: User can enter a keyword in the search bar
System displays a list of relevant products based on the keyword
User can refine their search results using filters

title: Add a shopping cart
description: As a user, I want to be able to add products to my shopping cart so that I can purchase multiple items at once.
acceptance_criteria: User can add products to their cart from the product list or product details page
System displays a notification and updates the cart icon to reflect the number of items in the cart
User can view and edit the contents of their cart

title: Implement checkout process
description: As a user, I want to be able to complete my purchase by checking out my shopping cart.
acceptance_criteria: User can initiate the checkout process from their cart
System displays a form for the user to enter their shipping and payment information
User can review and submit their order

title: Allow users to view their order history
description: As a user, I want to be able to view a history of my orders so that I can keep track of what I have purchased.
acceptance_criteria: User can view a list of their previous orders
System displays the date, order number, and status of each order
User can view the details of a specific order, including the items and total cost

title: Integrate with a payment gateway
description: As a developer, I want to integrate the application with a payment gateway so that users can complete their purchases.
acceptance_criteria: System can securely transmit the user's payment information to the payment gateway
Payment gateway can process the payment and return a response
System can handle successful and unsuccessful transactions and display appropriate messages to the user

title: Add product reviews
description: As a user, I want to be able to read and write reviews for products so that I can get a better understanding of the product and help others make informed decisions.
acceptance_criteria: User can view a list of their previous orders
System displays the date, order number, and status of each order
User can view the details of a specific order, including the items and total cost

title: Implement product sorting and filtering
description: As a user, I want to be able to sort and filter the product list so that I can find what I am looking for more easily.
acceptance_criteria: User can sort the product list by price, popularity, or date added
User can filter the product list by category, brand, or other attributes
System updates the product list in real-time as the user makes changes to the sorting and filtering options

title: Allow users to save their favorite products
description: As a user, I want to be able to save my favorite products so that I can easily find them later.
acceptance_criteria: User can add a product to their favorites from the product details page
System displays a notification and updates the reflect the number of items in the favorites list
User can view their list of favorite products at any time
User can remove products from their favorites list

title: Add product recommendations
description: As a user, I want to receive recommendations for products based on my past purchases and favorites so that I can discover new products that I may be interested in.
acceptance_criteria: System generates product recommendations based on the user's past purchases and favorites
System displays the recommendations on the home page or product list page
User can dismiss a recommendation if they are not interested

title: Integrate with a shipping provider
description: As a developer, I want to integrate the application with a shipping provider so that we can provide accurate shipping estimates and process shipping orders.
acceptance_criteria: System can retrieve shipping rates based on the user's location and the weight and size of the products in their cart
System can send shipping information to the shipping provider when the user submits their order
Shipping provider can provide tracking information for the user's order

title: Add support for multiple languages
description: As a developer, I want to add support for multiple languages to the application so that users from different countries can use the application in their preferred language.
acceptance_criteria: System can detect the user's preferred language from their device settings
System can translate all text and labels in the application to the user's preferred language
User can change their preferred language from a drop-down menu in the application

title: Allow users to contact customer support
description: As a user, I want to be able to contact customer support if I have a question or issue with the application.
acceptance_criteria: User can initiate a support request from a link in the application
System displays a form for the user to enter their question or issue
System routes the support request to the appropriate customer support representative

title: Add a product comparison feature
description: As a user, I want to be able to compare products so that I can make an informed decision about which product to purchase.
acceptance_criteria: User can add products to a comparison list from the product details page
System displays a comparison page with detailed information about each product, including photos, specifications, and reviews
User can remove products from the comparison list

title: Implement password reset functionality
description: As a user, I want to be able to reset my password if I forget it.
acceptance_criteria: User can initiate a password reset request from the login page
System sends a password reset email to the user's email
User can create a new password by following the link and entering the required information

title: Allow users to add products to their wishlist
description: As a user, I want to be able to add products to my wishlist so that I can keep track of items I am interested in.
acceptance_criteria: User can add a product to their wishlist from the product details page
System displays a notification and updates the wishlist icon to reflect the number of items in the list
User can view and edit their wishlist at any time

title: Add product ratings and statistics
description: As a user, I want to be able to see the ratings and statistics for products so that I can make informed purchasing decisions.
acceptance_criteria: System displays the average rating for each product based on customer reviews
System displays the number of ratings for each product
System displays a histogram or other visual representation of the distribution of ratings for each product

title: Implement product recommendations
description: As a user, I want to receive product recommendations based on my purchase history and other factors so that I can discover new products that I might be interested in.
acceptance_criteria: System generates recommendations for each user based on their purchase history, search history, and other relevant data
System displays the recommendations on the user's account page and in other relevant parts of the application
User can adjust the criteria used to generate recommendations and provide feedback on the recommendations they receive

title: Allow users to save their shipping and payment information
description: As a user, I want to be able to save my shipping and payment information so that I do not have to enter it every time I make a purchase.
acceptance_criteria: User can enter their shipping and payment information during the checkout process
System securely saves the information for the user
User can choose to use their saved information for future purchases or enter new information each time

title: Implement product zoom and 360-degree view
description: As a user, I want to be able to zoom in on products and view them from all angles so that I can get a better understanding of the product before I purchase it.
acceptance_criteria: User can zoom in on a product image by clicking on it
System displays a 360-degree view of the product that the user can rotate by clicking and dragging
System displays multiple images of the product from different angles

title: Integrate payment gateway
description: As a user, I want to be able to purchase products using a secure payment gateway so that I can complete my transactions easily and confidently.
acceptance_criteria: System integrates with a popular payment gateway
User can select from multiple payment options, including credit card and PayPal
System securely processes the payment and displays a confirmation message

title: Add order tracking
description: As a user, I want to be able to track my order status so that I know when to expect my purchase to arrive.
acceptance_criteria: System assigns a unique order number for each purchase
System displays the order status and tracking information on the user's account page
User can view the delivery date and tracking information for each order

title: Allow users to return products
description: As a user, I want to be able to return products if I am not satisfied with my purchase so that I can get a refund or exchange.
acceptance_criteria: System provides clear information on the return policy and process
User can initiate a return request from the order details page
System provides a return label and instructions for the user to return the product

title: Implement a loyalty program
description: As a user, I want to be able to earn rewards for my purchases so that I feel valued and motivated to continue shopping with the company.
acceptance_criteria: System tracks the number of purchases made by each user
System assigns points for each purchase and displays the user's current points balance
System allows users to redeem their points for rewards, such as discounts, free shipping, and exclusive products

title: Implement an intelligent search engine
description: As a user, I want to be able to search for products in an intelligent way so that I can find what I am looking for more quickly and easily.
acceptance_criteria: System suggests products as the user types in the search bar
System returns relevant results based on the user's search history, location, and popularity of the products
System displays a search results page with filters and sorting options

title: Allow users to track their order history
description: As a user, I want to be able to view my order history so that I can keep track of my purchases.
acceptance_criteria: User can access their order history from their account page
System displays a list of the user's past orders, including the date, order number, total cost, and status
User can view the details of each order, including the items purchased, shipping address, and payment method

title: Allow users to create an account
description: As a user, I want to be able to create an account on the website so that I can save my information and order history.
acceptance_criteria: System displays a sign-up form with fields for email, password, and name
User can submit the form to create a new account
System stores the user's information securely and displays a success message after the account is created

title: Allow users to log in
description: As a user, I want to be able to log in to the website so that I can access my account information.
acceptance_criteria: System displays a login form with fields for email and password
User can submit the form to log in to their account
System displays a success message and redirects the user to their account page after a successful login

title: Allow users to add items to their cart
description: As a user, I want to be able to add items to my cart so that I can keep track of what I want to purchase.
acceptance_criteria: System displays a 'Add to Cart' button on product pages
User can click the button to add the product to their cart
System updates the cart count and displays a success message after an item is added

title: Allow users to view their cart
description: As a user, I want to be able to view the items in my cart so that I can see what I have selected to purchase.
acceptance_criteria: System displays a cart icon in the header that shows the number of items in the cart
User can click the cart icon to view their cart
System displays a list of the items in the cart, including the name, image, price, and quantity

title: Allow users to update the quantity of items in their cart
description: As a user, I want to be able to update the quantity of items in my cart so that I can make changes to my order.
acceptance_criteria: System displays a quantity input for each item in the cart
User can enter a new quantity for each item in the cart
System updates the total cost of the order and displays a success message after the quantity is updated

title: Add user authentication
description: As a website visitor, I want to be able to create an account and log in so that I can access my personal information and order history.
acceptance_criteria: User can navigate to the sign-up page from the homepage
User can provide a username, email, and password to create an account
System confirms that the email is unique and password meets the security requirements
User can log in with their email and password and access their account information
User can log out and the session is terminated

title: Allow users to leave product reviews
description: As a customer, I want to be able to leave a review for a product I have purchased so that I can share my feedback and help others make informed purchasing decisions.
acceptance_criteria: User can navigate to a product's review section from the product details page
User must be logged in to leave a review
User can provide a rating and written review
System displays an average rating and the number of reviews for each product on the product details page
System displays a list of all reviews for a product, including the reviewer's username and the date of the review

title: Implement a shopping cart
description: As a shopper, I want to be able to add items to a cart and view the contents of my cart so that I can manage my purchases before checkout.
acceptance_criteria: User can add an item to the cart from the product details page
User can view the contents of their cart from the cart icon in the header
System displays a list of the items in the cart, including the product name, quantity, and subtotal
User can update the quantity of an item in the cart
User can remove an item from the cart

title: Provide a secure checkout process
description: As a shopper, I want to be able to securely enter my payment information and shipping address during checkout so that I can complete my purchase.
acceptance_criteria: User must be logged in to initiate checkout
System displays the contents of the user's cart and the total cost
User can enter a shipping address and select a shipping method
User can enter their payment information, including the credit card number, expiration date, and security code
System displays a confirmation page with the order details and a unique order number
User can place the order and receive a confirmation email

title: Implement online class booking system
description: As a gym member, I want to be able to book a fitness class online so that I can easily plan my workout schedule.
acceptance_criteria: User can view the schedule of available classes on the gym's website
User can select a class and see its details, including the instructor, start time, and class description
User can book a class by providing their membership ID and a payment method
System confirms the booking with a unique booking reference number
User can view their upcoming bookings in their account page

title: Implement online class booking system
description: As a gym member, I want to be able to book a fitness class online so that I can easily plan my workout schedule.
acceptance_criteria: User can view the schedule of available classes on the gym's website
User can select a class and see its details, including the instructor, start time, and class description
User can book a class by providing their membership ID and a payment method
System confirms the booking with a unique booking reference number
User can view their upcoming bookings in their account page

title: Provide real-time order tracking
description: As a food delivery service user, I want to be able to see real-time updates on the status of my order so that I know when to expect my food.
acceptance_criteria: User can view the status of their order in real-time on the delivery service's website or mobile app
System updates the status of the order as it is prepared, picked up, and delivered
User can see the estimated time of arrival of their delivery
User receives a notification when the delivery is on its way and when it has been delivered
User can rate their delivery experience and provide feedback

title: Add product filtering options
description: As a shopper, I want to be able to filter product search results by price, brand, and category so that I can find the items I want more efficiently.
acceptance_criteria: User can select filter options from a menu on the search results page
User can filter results by price range, brand, and category
System updates the search results in real-time as the user selects different filter options
User can remove a filter option or reset all filters to see the full search results
System saves the user's preferred filter options for future searches

title: Create mobile banking app
description: As a bank customer, I want to be able to view my account balance and transaction history on my mobile device so that I can manage my finances on the go.
acceptance_criteria: User can download the bank's mobile app from the App Store or Google Play
User can log in to the app with their online banking credentials
System displays the user's account balances and recent transactions
User can view transaction details and categorize transactions as necessary
User can transfer funds between accounts and pay bills from the app

title: Implement a calendar for scheduling appointments
description: As a healthcare provider, I want to be able to view and schedule appointments with my patients through a calendar interface so that I can manage my schedule efficiently.
acceptance_criteria: Calendar displays the provider's schedule for the current week
Provider can view the availability for each day and time slot
Provider can create a new appointment by selecting a time slot and entering the patient's information
Appointment information is saved to the provider's calendar and the patient's account
Provider can edit or cancel an appointment if necessary

title: Allow users to create custom to-do lists
description: As a productivity app user, I want to be able to create custom to-do lists and organize my tasks by priority and deadline so that I can stay on track.
acceptance_criteria: User can create a new to-do list and give it a title
User can add tasks to the list and specify a due date and priority level
Tasks are displayed in the order of their due date, with the nearest deadline at the top
User can mark a task as complete and it is removed from the list
User can edit or delete a task if necessary

title: Add a live chat feature for customer support
description: As a website visitor, I want to be able to chat with a customer support representative in real-time so that I can get help quickly and efficiently.
acceptance_criteria: Visitor can initiate a chat session from a chat icon on the website
System matches the visitor with an available support representative
Visitor and representative can exchange messages in real-time
Representative can access the visitor's account information and previous support requests during the chat session
Chat session is terminated when the visitor closes the chat window

title: Allow users to save and compare product prices
description: As a shopper, I want to be able to save products I am interested in and compare their prices at different retailers so that I can make informed purchasing decisions.
acceptance_criteria: User can add a product to their saved items from the product details page
User can view a list of their saved items and compare prices from different retailers
System displays a bar graph to visually compare the prices
User can remove a product from their saved items if they no longer have interest
User can purchase a product directly from the price comparison page

title: Implement a calendar for scheduling appointments
description: As a healthcare provider, I want to be able to view and schedule appointments with my patients through a calendar interface so that I can manage my schedule efficiently.
acceptance_criteria: Calendar displays the provider's schedule for the current week
Provider can view the availability for each day and time slot
Provider can create a new appointment by selecting a time slot and entering the patient's information
Appointment information is saved to the provider's calendar and the patient's account
Provider can edit or cancel an appointment if necessary

title: Allow users to create custom to-do lists
description: As a productivity app user, I want to be able to create custom to-do lists and organize my tasks by priority and deadline so that I can stay on track.
acceptance_criteria: User can create a new to-do list and give it a title
User can add tasks to the list and specify a due date and priority level
Tasks are displayed in the order of their due date, with the nearest deadline at the top
User can mark a task as complete and it is removed from the list
User can edit or delete a task if necessary

title: Add a live chat feature for customer support
description: As a website visitor, I want to be able to chat with a customer support representative in real-time so that I can get help quickly and efficiently.
acceptance_criteria: Visitor can initiate a chat session from a chat icon on the website
System matches the visitor with an available support representative
Visitor and representative can exchange messages in real-time
Representative can access the visitor's account information and previous support requests during the chat session
Chat session is terminated when the visitor closes the chat window

title: Allow users to save and compare product prices
description: As a shopper, I want to be able to save products I am interested in and compare their prices at different retailers so that I can make informed purchasing decisions.
acceptance_criteria: User can add a product to their saved items from the product details page
User can view a list of their saved items and compare prices from different retailers
System displays a bar graph to visually compare the prices
User can remove a product from their saved items if they no longer have interest
User can purchase a product directly from the price comparison page

title: Allow users to track their daily water intake
description: As a health conscious individual, I want to be able to track how much water I drink each day so that I can ensure I am staying hydrated.
acceptance_criteria: User can enter the amount of water they drink in ounces or milliliters
System converts the entered amount to a standard unit of measurement (ounces)
System keeps a record of the user's daily water intake
User can view their daily and weekly water intake history
System reminds the user to drink water throughout the day based on their daily goal

title: Provide real-time traffic updates
description: As a daily commuter, I want to be able to view real-time traffic updates on my navigation app so that I can plan my route and avoid delays.
acceptance_criteria: System displays the current traffic conditions on the map
System highlights congested areas in red and less congested areas in green
System calculates an estimated time of arrival based on the traffic conditions
System provides alternate route options based on current traffic conditions
User can select a preferred route and receive real-time updates on their journey

title: Allow users to schedule recurring appointments
description: As a busy individual, I want to be able to schedule recurring appointments, such as a weekly yoga class or monthly doctor's visit, so that I can stay on top of my schedule.
acceptance_criteria: User can select a recurring frequency (daily, weekly, monthly, etc.)
User can select a start date and end date for the recurring appointment
System automatically schedules the recurring appointment on the selected dates and frequency
User can view a list of all of their recurring appointments
User can edit or delete a recurring appointment if necessary

title: Allow users to personalize their news feed
description: As a news reader, I want to be able to personalize my news feed so that I only see articles on topics I am interested in.
acceptance_criteria: User can select their preferred topics of interest (politics, sports, technology, etc.)
System displays articles on the selected topics in the user's news feed
User can change their preferred topics at any time
System suggests new topics based on the user's reading history
User can view a full list of all available topics
